name: Paper Snow
description:
Paper Snow is a yuri kinetic novel about the pain and joy of knowing someone you love is happy without you. 

At some point in life, your path might diverge from the people you least expect to say goodbye to. There is no set when and where for this momentous event. No red circled reminder on a calendar, no ear-marked page on a journal. There is no indicator for the last time you’ll ever meet someone. Only the memory of it, after it’s all over. Story by Caednis— Twitter
Music and SFX by Paul Orsoni— Website, Twitter
Code and VFX by microAeris— Website, Twitter 
Art by DacuriBlue— Website, Twitter, Twitter2
Kiss Animation by LemonaPink— Website, Twitter
